data

Class Ligne

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Ligne

  • public class Ligne
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of the train line by a graph of stations. Built by parsing a JSON file, located in data/ligne.json.
    Author:
    Alexandre Fourgs ?
